title: Client Bot blue side screen put my team on top red team
body: Hey {{champion:77}} ! Just had a game where I believed we'd be blue side cause  you know, my team was on the bot side in the client screen (loading into game) and all of a sudden when the game started my team was top red side, This isn't intentional isn't it? Because I always recalled it being bot side blue, top side red, this wasn't intermediate bots, it was normals and it~~ put me in anaphylactic shock~~ honestly  triggered me.{{item:3073}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3073}}
